title: Publicizing court filings?
question: Can an opening brief and reply brief for an appeal in the Ninth Circuit Court be posted online or widely distributed via email?
question_tags: Immigration,Deportation,Deportation appeals,Bankruptcy,Chapter 7 bankruptcy,Debt,Bankruptcy and debt,Felony crime,Government law,Appeals
answers:
Pleadings are public record unless court has approved confidentiality.
You may publish provided no confidentiality privilege violated.
Check with your attorney to avoid improper publication of particular pleadings and documents.
